H0.text: Which of the Noble Gases takes its name from the Greek for 'hidden' . Argon

H1.text: Which of the Noble Gases takes its name from the Greek for 'hidden' . Xenon

H2.text: Which of the Noble Gases takes its name from the Greek for 'hidden' . Neon

H3.text: Which of the Noble Gases takes its name from the Greek for 'hidden' . KRYPTON

A4.text: Krypton was named after the Greek word κρυπτός, meaning 'hidden'.

A5.text: Xenon was named after the Greek word ξένος, meaning 'stranger', not 'hidden'.
